meanings.sent1: The hyperstimulations from the loud music made her dance all night.
meanings.sent2: The children's hyperstimulations at the amusement park were contagious.
meanings.sent3: The hyperstimulations of the puppy meeting its new toy were adorable to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperstimulations over winning the game were evident in her joyful screams.
meanings.sent5: The hyperstimulations of the crowd during the concert created a lively atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The hyperstimulations of the audience by the magician's tricks amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The hyperstimulations of the students during the science experiment were hard to contain.
meanings.sent3: The hyperstimulations of the cat chasing a laser pointer provided endless entertainment.
meanings.sent4: The hyperstimulations of the car engine revving signaled the start of the race.
meanings.sent5: The hyperstimulations of the baby's laughter filled the room with joy.
